settings.title: Post Notification Configuration

new_discussion.to: Comma separated list of email addresses for the To recipient for new discussions
new_discussion.bcc: Comma separated list of email addresses for the BCC recipient for new discussions

new_post.to: Comma separated list of email addresses for the To recipient for new posts
new_post.bcc: Comma separated list of email addresses for the BCC recipient for new posts

revised_post.to: Comma separated list of email addresses for the To recipient for revised posts
revised_post.bcc: Comma separated list of email addresses for the BCC recipient for revised posts

settings.new_discussion: Label for describing a new discussion
settings.new_post: Label for describing a new post
settings.revised_post: Label for describing a revised post
